title: The Astros and the Phillies in a Big Series? We’ve Seen This Before.
description: The 1980 N.L.C.S. between Houston and Philadelphia has endured as one of the greatest postseason series in history. This year’s World Series has big shoes to fill.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:credit: F. Carter Smith/UPI, via Getty Images
media:description: At the end of a wild National League Championship Series in which four of the five games went to extra innings, Garry Maddox and the 1980 Philadelphia Phillies had plenty of reason to celebrate.
